```{r create plots, include=F}
plots <- reportbrick::showMatchingComparison("{path}", showTitles = FALSE)
```


```{r plot loop, results='asis',fig.width=15, fig.height={figHeight}, echo=F, message=F, warning=F}
for (ref in names(plots)) {
  plotRef <- plots[[ref]]
  if (is.null(plotRef)) {
    next
  }
  cat(paste0("# ", ref))
  if (inherits(plotRef, "ggplot")) {
    cat("\n\n")
    print(plotRef)
  } else {
    cat("{.tabset .tabset-pills}\n\n")
    for (tab in names(plotRef)) {
      plotTab <- plotRef[[tab]]
      cat(paste0("## ", tab, "\n\n"))
      print(plotTab)
      cat("\n\n")
    }
  }
  cat("\n\n")
}
```
